name: Cape
description:
In truth, there is an altogether different reason you are standing at the stoop of this place with a hoodie pulled over your head, glasses fogging up against your eyes, a rusting crowbar in your hands.

A near-future origin story for an outsider superhero. Cape is a novella-length story with roughly 30,000 words of unique text, originally written for the 2015 Interactive Fiction competition.
